item.title: Gemini CLI Configuration
item.description: A note summarizing the configuration for the Gemini CLI. Includes the student workflow prompt and the PowerShell functions used to interact with the CLI.

item.title: Gemini CLI Setup Completed
item.description: Completed installation and configuration of Gemini CLI with PowerShell functions. Overcame CORS and database errors. Integrated the CLI into the study workflow.
